meanings.definition: Impermanencies - the state or quality of being impermanent
meanings.sent1: The impermanencies of life remind us to cherish each moment.
meanings.sent2: She reflected on the impermanencies of nature as the seasons changed.
meanings.sent3: The impermanencies of the weather made planning a picnic quite challenging.
meanings.sent4: Like the shifting sands, impermanencies in relationships can be unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the impermanencies of time in a stunning painting.

meanings.definition: Impermanencies - things that are impermanent or temporary
meanings.sent1: The impermanencies of youth are evident in how quickly children grow.
meanings.sent2: He packed lightly, knowing the impermanencies of travel.
meanings.sent3: The impermanencies of fashion trends always keep designers on their toes.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the impermanencies of flowers blooming and withering are a cycle of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The impermanencies of a sandcastle remind us of the fleeting nature of childhood.
